name: Cube Rush Adventure
description:
Get ready for a fun-packed puzzle adventure! Play this awesome tap 2 game for free and enjoy loads of challenging levels. Download and play Cube Rush Adventure and join the cube crushing fun today! Solve all the puzzles, clear all the levels, reach the target and win cool boosters.

This endless fun tapping game may look easy, but it is really challenging to master. With limited moves in every level, it’s all up to your thumbs - make smart blasts and collapse more colored blocks. Try to clear the board with fewer moves to get a higher score. You can restart any level without having to wait for lives, as they are unlimited.

Match and crush toys in a super fun puzzle game - it’s free, it's awesome, and it’s addicting!
Swipe and match 2 or more adjacent cubes to complete missions, reach high scores, and clear levels. Be the ultimate bomber, swap and match your way - tap and crush cubes and BOOM - create a major explosion in one of the best free puzzle games!


Play Cube Rush Adventure tap 2 game, and enjoy the best puzzle block crush tap 2 game features:
- Hit and tap to play! Connect and smash 2 or more adjacent tiles and bricks of the same color to create a crush.
- Plenty of fun levels filled with cool puzzles and challenges that will train your brain.
- Beautiful and amazing new toys game graphics and colorful designs.
- Try exploding amazing boosts and gifts that will create a combo and help you along the way.
- Easy to learn and play - crush and collapse toys and clear the board to advance and become the winner!
- Awesome and relaxing blaster game to play with family and friends.

** Unlock awesome rewards and boosters that will create a big CRUSH:
- Match, crush and burst 5 or 6 colored blocks to get a rocket.
- Crash, match and explode 7 or 8 tiles to get a bomb.
- Swipe, swap, and match 9 toy cubes to earn a color wheel
Rockets, bombs and color wheels will help you smash the blocks and solve the challenges!

Fan of online puzzle games? Can’t get enough of exciting brain teasers? Then Cube Rush Adventure is simply perfect for you! Show off with your strategy skills - match, tap and explode tiles to complete challenges and win points. Cube Rush Adventure game is the most fun and addicting matching game in the store!

It's an amazing cube game for all of you who are looking for a fun way to relax and pass the time. Join the color blasting adventure and have a blast crushing and bursting all the colorful bricks!
